msbt.message: Hey, . Have a minute? Check it out
Somewhere around jumping jack , I get this sense of total clarity and purpose, andI had an idea.You met , right? The one that just moved here?
Well, if we get enough hyper-athletes like THAT to move here, we could start our own team!Y'know, or just have a bunch of cool workout buddies to hang out with. Either way, .
So! My idea was to stick decorations around. Then we can attract some first-round neighboring talent.

I pitched this to and we both agreedIt should be YOU who throws out the inaugural first decoration!Oh, except, uheither you've been doing some REALLY weird squats or your pockets are full.No harm, no foul ball. I can mail it to you. Just don't forget to put it out, alright? You can do it!
I pitched this to and we both agreedIt should be YOU who throws out the inaugural first decoration!
Your , so your call. Game on!
What's up, ? You flexin' those decoration muscles, ?
Well, making awesome is a team effort, so I got something for you too!
Oh, except, uheither you've been doing some REALLY weird squats or your pockets are full.No harm, no foul ball. I can mail it to you. Just don't forget to put it out, alright? You can do it!
Your , so your call. Game on!
